Trade/Device Name(s): CDC Influenza 2009 A(H1N1)pdm Real-Time RT-PCR Panel
Submitter Information: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
Regulation Name(s): Reagents for detection of specific novel influenza A viruses
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Applied Biosystems 7500 Fast Dx Real-Time PCR Instrument
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for CDC Influenza 2009 A(H1N1)pdm Real-Time RT-PCR Panel for qualitative detection and differentiation of influenza A and 2009 H1N1 virus RNA in respiratory specimens using real-time RT-PCR.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection and differentiation of influenza virus type A and 2009 H1N1 virus RNA in upper and lower respiratory specimens and viral cultures from patients with respiratory infection, for clinical diagnosis and epidemiologic surveillance.
